FlowDefinition.description:
This flow is Default sub flow which is used to call for all the flows.
Version 7 --This version is updated to "Okay" to "Case details" button label Version 8 -- Deleted the responseVar1 variable Version 9 -- a. Save to Case.Description - descriptionOfIssue, b. Pointed Case Origin to "Employee Portal" in case creation element. c. Removed Fetching Queue Name ID and Record Type ID from parent flow and added to this Subflow version. d. Removed unwanted variables.
